# Error handling
! exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite show
stderr 'show requires a task id'

! exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite edit
stderr 'edit requires a task id'

! exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite done
stderr 'at least one id is required'

! exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite done abc
stderr 'invalid id "abc"'

! exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite add
stderr 'title required'

! exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite add --due 2026-13-01 Task
stderr 'invalid date format'

! exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite add --meta badmeta Task
stderr 'invalid meta'

! exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite add --state someday Task
stderr 'invalid state "someday"'

! exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite list --all --done
stderr 'cannot combine --all with --done'

! exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite import --format yaml -
stderr 'invalid format "yaml"'

! exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite export --format yaml -
stderr 'invalid format "yaml"'

exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite add Check conflict
! exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite edit 1 --done --state now
stderr 'cannot combine --done with --state other than done'
